name: Back2Balance
short_description:
Back 2 Balance is contacted every year by thousands of individuals, just like you. Back 2 Balancea??s goal is to provide you with appropriate guidance and the very best in chiropractic care in order for you to stay the most effective possible health. The clinic's chiropractors are spinal healthcare profe ssionals who focus on the diagnosis and treatment of mechanical disorders of the joints and their results on the nervous system. Our staff are renowned for their successful treatments of common muscle and joint issues, along with back and neck pain and migraines. 

For more than twenty-five years our Hove based seasoned chiropractors have been treating clients of all ages throughout Brighton and Hove and the South East. 
Our practice is among the earliest and most honored clinics in Hove, and we're moreover among the only clinics to boast offering each client their own private room. Back 2 Balance takes great pride in our excellent care, professional staff, and relaxing environment.
